summary: I am a physician-scientist with a focus on cardiovascular medicine and have a strong interest in the intersection of science, healthcare and business. I have a growing track record in translational and clinical research (>25 scientific publications in peer-reviewed journals), in which I have demonstrated to be an effective and international collaborator across multiple disciplines.
